pullRequest.title: Reduce average query size sent to Solr
pullRequest.bodyText:
What does this PR do?
Reduces AnyText query parameters from 3200 characters down to 200 characters.  Now by default, only the metadata, title, description fields will be queried for AnyText queries.  This can be configured with the solr.query.anytext.fields system property to add more fields based on user needs.

Removes the dynamic generation of AnyText fields. This creates poor
query performance when expanding to hundreds of fields.
Removes filtered attribute feature that generated large field lists
but failed to significantly reduce query time for majority of queries.
Removes spellcheck parameter if spell check is not enabled for the query.
Removes score from field list if not sorting by relevance.

Who is reviewing it?

Select relevant component teams:

@codice/solr
Ask 2 committers to review/merge the PR and tag them here.

How should this be tested?

Ingest data and perform AnyText queries for tokens in the metadata, title, description fields.
Any background context you want to provide?
https://www.slideshare.net/lucidworks/query-hundreds-of-fields-at-scale-yannis-hector-salesforce-david-smiley-d-w-smiley-llc?qid=96050cd7-1b2b-4ee9-97c3-8dab60a66741&v=&b=&from_search=1
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hqeYAnsxPH8
What are the relevant tickets?
Fixes: n/a
Screenshots

params={q=+(+(point-of-contact_txt_tokenized:"test"+source-id_txt_tokenized:"test"+metacard.deleted.tags_txt_tokenized:"test"+contact.publisher-name_txt_tokenized:"test"+metacard.deleted.id_txt_tokenized:"test"+validation-errors_txt_tokenized:"test"+media.type_txt_tokenized:"test"+id_txt_tokenized:"test"+ext.extracted.text_txt_tokenized:"test"+contact.creator-email_txt_tokenized:"test"+contact.creator-address_txt_tokenized:"test"+metacard_type_name_txt_tokenized:"test"+checksum_txt_tokenized:"test"+metacard.version.edited-by_txt_tokenized:"test"+metacard.deleted.version_txt_tokenized:"test"+checksum-algorithm_txt_tokenized:"test"+metacard.version.resource-uri_txt_tokenized:"test"+metadata-content-type-version_txt_tokenized:"test"+security.access-groups_txt_tokenized:"test"+title_txt_tokenized:"test"+validation-warnings_txt_tokenized:"test"+media.format_txt_tokenized:"test"+metacard.owner_txt_tokenized:"test"+contact.publisher-address_txt_tokenized:"test"+contact.creator-phone_txt_tokenized:"test"+security.access-individuals_txt_tokenized:"test"+topic.keyword_txt_tokenized:"test"+contact.publisher-email_txt_tokenized:"test"+media.encoding_txt_tokenized:"test"+topic.category_txt_tokenized:"test"+failed-validators-warnings_txt_tokenized:"test"+resource.derived-download-url_txt_tokenized:"test"+metacard.associations.derived_txt_tokenized:"test"+contact.contributor-email_txt_tokenized:"test"+contact.point-of-contact-name_txt_tokenized:"test"+failed-validators-errors_txt_tokenized:"test"+metacard.version.type_txt_tokenized:"test"+resource-size_txt_tokenized:"test"+security.access-administrators_txt_tokenized:"test"+media.compression_txt_tokenized:"test"+metacard.associations.related_txt_tokenized:"test"+location.country-code_txt_tokenized:"test"+metadata-content-type_txt_tokenized:"test"+contact.creator-name_txt_tokenized:"test"+contact.contributor-phone_txt_tokenized:"test"+security.access-groups-read_txt_tokenized:"test"+contact.publisher-phone_txt_tokenized:"test"+meta After
solr1    | 2020-09-17 18:06:46.004 INFO  (qtp631673932-132) [c:catalog s:shard6 r:core_node24 x:catalog_shard6_replica_n22] o.a.s.c.S.Request [catalog_shard6_replica_n22]  webapp=/solr path=/select params={q=+(+(title_txt_tokenized:"test"+description_txt_tokenized:"test"+metadata_txt_tokenized:"test")+AND+metacard-tags_txt_tokenized:"resource"+)+&_stateVer_=catalog:9&start=0&rows=1&wt=javabin&version=2} hits=1268 status=0 QTime=19

Checklist:

 Documentation Updated
 Update / Add Threat Dragon models
 Update / Add Unit Tests
 Update / Add Integration Tests

Notes on Review Process
Please see Notes on Review Process for further guidance on requirements for merging and abbreviated reviews.
Review Comment Legend:

✏️ (Pencil) This comment is a nitpick or style suggestion, no action required for approval. This comment should provide a suggestion either as an in line code snippet or a gist.
❓ (Question Mark) This comment is to gain a clearer understanding of design or code choices, clarification is required but action may not be necessary for approval.
❗ (Exclamation Mark) This comment is critical and requires clarification or action before approval.

nodes.bodyText: I think we should include ext.extracted-text by default as well.
❓  Should we filter blank strings to account for redundant commas in the system property?
❓  Not sure how meaningful the implications are of not sending the spell check option to Solr. Worth writing a test for it?

beforeCommit.message:
Reduce average query size sent to Solr

- Removes the dynamic generation of AnyText fields. This creates poor
  query performance when expanding to hundreds of fields.
- Removes filtered attribute feature that generated large field lists
  but failed to significantly reduce query time for majority of
  queries.
- Removes spellcheck parameter if spell check is not enabled for the
  query.
- Removes score from field list if not sorting by relevance.
